name: Sci-Fi RaiRoboska!? (demo)
description:
We are looking for volunteers for a little experiment we're doing. We are trying to analyse how choices effect a dystopian world and we could be looking for you! In this project you'll be given a meat suit and you'll be in charge of making vital and unimportant choices! To start just click the green flag on screen. We would like to state that this experiment is still in alpha so only the first chapter (or as it's called, a save file) but in the full release there will be a total of 6 save files! This is technically a RPG/visual novel crossover, but because most of the RPG elements (like battling) come in later, I categorised it as visual novel.

Music is on the soundtrack (I'm still adding to it but the songs are all there)

I did all the coding in Scratch because I'm useless at any other programming language.

Also on Newgrounds: oooooooooooo

Download (Mediafire): ooooo

Credits to my brother for being the first alpha tester (despite him only clicking the printer and not actually progressing)
